title: New champ select encourages more trolling thanks alot..
body:
thanks alot for the new champ select its obvious it wasnt thought out properly as it now encoruages more trolling to begin with our last game our lee just constantly started banning our preferred champions and started abusing the "fill" role where they can play where ever he wants

also since its the beginning of the season the matchmaker is all over the place unbalanced teams , and more trolls so watch out (;

replies.body: For the preferred role thing, I'm just gonna pick someone I'll never play. I knew from the beginning that trolls would obviously ban your preferred champ. That idea was just plain stupid.
Constantly banning your champions? But with the new champ select a player can only ban one champion?
